Description:
Detects commands that indicate a Raccine removal from an end system. Raccine is a free ransomware protection tool.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Raccine Uninstall
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%schtasks%' and command like '%/delete%' and command like '%raccine rules updater%') or (command like '%taskkill %' and command like '%raccinesettings.exe%') or (command like '%reg.exe%' and command like '%delete%' and command like '%raccine tray%'))
